title: Drawing, "Design for carriage understructure", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash, on white laid paper
markings: Stamp: Cooper Union Museum, New York
inscribed:
Upper center, pen and black ink: Lisoire, avecque Les deux moutons/ vue de face
At right, vertically: Mouton de profils
At left, vertically: Mouton

Verso, in graphite, larrosserie/ ... de la Londe/ Cahier G No. 4 -
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Profile of the beam us shown beside the elevation of the understructure which is decorated with a beaded oval at center within a shield, garlands at top and bottom, volutes at either side. At top, scale: 2 pied. Framing lines.
